monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Pulls player towards a grappling anchor
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)

skills.name: Armor Bypass
skills.description: This Monster's attacks ignore 20% of the target's Defense damage reduction value.

skills.name: Bleed
skills.description: Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Blizzard
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Blood Drive
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Poison, Burn or Congeal damage, there is a 75% chance to apply a Bleed stack equal to that damage.

skills.name: Congeal
skills.description: Unique Aura: Chill (Debuff) deals damage to enemies at the start of their turn based on their missing Mana.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Freeze
skills.description: The first critical hit of an ability applies Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Critical Hex
skills.description: The first critical hit of an ability applies a random Debuff.

skills.name: Dark Instinct
skills.description: Increases damage dealt by 20%.

skills.name: Dark Shroud
skills.description: 8 x 75% (600%) magical damage (neutral) applies 2 stacks of Tether and Blind.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Encapsulate
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (40 + 15% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (80% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (50 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (100% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (60 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (120% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (70 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (150% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 9 x (90 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (200% Max Mana)

skills.name: Feast
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Bleed damage, heal all Monsters in the party by 15% of that amount.

skills.name: Heal Charging
skills.description: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Hexing Support
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, apply a random Debuff on a random enemy.

skills.name: Ice Bolt
skills.description: 1 x 220% magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 275% magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 1 x 335% magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 1 x 410% magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 1 x 510% magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Ice Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Initial Chill
skills.description: Apply Chill (Debuff) to a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Initial Poison
skills.description: Apply Poison (Debuff) on a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magical Weakness
skills.description: Magical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Multi Chill
skills.description: Aura: Chill (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Necromancy
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party is revived, it additionally heals 20% of its Max Health, gains 3 random Debuffs and 3 Age stacks.

skills.name: Neutral Resistance
skills.description: Neutral damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Occult Power
skills.description: Grants target Goblin or Occult Monster 4 random Buffs and a shield equal to 40% of their Max Health.

skills.name: Phoenix Affinity
skills.description: When this Monster is knocked out for the first time in combat, it is revived with 10% of its Max Health.

skills.name: Poison Bomb
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud
skills.description: 1 x 155% magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 200% magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Replenish
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (300 + 50% Magic) Shield all for 2 x (350 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Revive
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 5 x (50 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 2
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (75 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 3
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (125 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Shadow Grasp
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (neutral) applies 2 stacks of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Grasp Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (neutral) applies 3 stacks of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm
skills.description: 2 x 65% (130%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 80% (160%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 110% (220%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 145% (290%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Shield Aura
skills.description: Aura: All Shield effects of Monsters in the party are increased by 10%.

skills.name: Shield Burst
skills.description: Expends 90% of all Shield to deal magical (neutral) damage to a single enemy equal to 140% of the Shield strength, cannot be dodged, cannot critically hit

skills.name: Shield Burst Lvl 2
skills.description: Expends 90% of all Shield to deal magical (neutral) damage to a single enemy equal to 175% of the Shield strength, cannot be dodged, cannot critically hit

skills.name: Sure Strike
skills.description: First hit of an ability has a 10% increased Critical Chance and cannot be dodged.

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

drops.name: Level Badge
drops.description: Increases Monster level by 1. Can be used on monsters that are at least 2 levels below your highest monster.

drops.name: Phoenix Serum
drops.description: Revives target Heal target for 5 x 450
